SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DemoFragment
Demonstrates access to and observation of LiveData elements in LoginViewModel, UserViewModel, PermissionsViewModel, and PreferencesViewModel, as well as acting as a navigation placeholder.
GoogleSignInService
Provides ReactiveX-integrated Google Sign In client flows for signing in, refreshing the bearer token, and signing out.
LoginActivity
Presents a simple login screen, which is bypassed if a silent refresh/sign-in attempt succeeds.
LoginViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current signed-in state and GoogleSignInAccount.
MainActivity
Serves as a basic container activity—that is, it presents no UI elements of its own (apart from an options menu), but hosts a NavHostFragment for presentation of one or more Fragment instances, associated with a navigation graph.
NavigationGraphDirections
 
NavigationGraphDirections.ExplainPermissions
 
Pattern
This entity class represents a knitting pattern and holds its data structures.
PatternBuilderDialogFragment
This DialogFragment is the dialogue that will pop up on navigating to the PatternBuilderFragment.
PatternBuilderFragment
This Fragment is the PatternBuilderFragment.
PatternDao
Provides CRUD operations on Pattern entity instances.
PatternLibraryAdapter
This RecyclerView.Adapter is the joining element between the data and the view model.
PatternLibraryAdapter.OnPatternClickListener
This functional interface is an DialogInterface.OnClickListener that allows me to listen for when a pattern is clicked in the RecyclerView.
PatternLibraryFragment
This is the PatternLibraryFragment and it holds the logic that recalls Pattern instances that are represented by individual items in the RecyclerView in the UI.
PatternLibraryViewModel
Provides access (For a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current state of the Pattern Library
PatternLocation
This POJO is a class that allows for a multi-table join allowing me to recall the row and stitch associated with a particular Pattern instance.
PatternReaderFragment
This Fragment holds the logic for the PatternReaderFragment that the user will use to read a pattern that they selected from the PatternLibraryFragment.
PatternRepository
Provides high-level operations on a repository of Pattern instances, backed by a SQLite database, in turn accessed via SereknittyDatabase.
PatternWithRows
This POJO is a class that allows for a multi-table join allowing me to recall the rows associated with a particular Pattern instance.
PermissionsExplanationFragment
Presents a modal dialog of rationales for permissions requested by this app.
PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener
Declares the PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener.onAcknowledge(String[]) method to be implemented by the host activity (typically using a lambda), to resume the permissions flow after display of the permission rationales/explanations.
PermissionsRepository
Implements a LiveData-based repository of permissions granted by the user, and handles the low-level details of the permissions flow.
PermissionsViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current permissions state—that is, to the set of permissions which have been granted by the user.
PreferencesRepository
Implements a LiveData-based repository of preferences.
PreferencesViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to some subset of the current preferences state.
Row
This entity represents a row in a Pattern.
RowDao
Provides CRUD operations on Row entity instances.
RowsAdapter
This Adapter is the joining element between the data and the view model.
RowStitch
This class represents the stitches that make up a Row
RowStitchDao
Provides CRUD operations on RowStitch entity instances.
RowWithStitches
This POJO is a class that allows for a multi-table join allowing me to recall the stitches associated with a particular Row instance.
SereknittyApplication
Initializes (in the SereknittyApplication.onCreate() method) application-level resources that cannot be handled with Hilt dependency injection.
SereknittyDatabase
Defines a connection to a local Room/SQLite database, All database reads/writes are performed using data-access object (DAO) instances obtained from the singleton instance of this class.
SereknittyDatabase.Callback
Implements methods to be invoked on key database events.
SereknittyDatabase.Converters
Defines converters for otherwise unsupported types (initially, just Instant) to one of those supported by Room/SQLite.
SereknittyDatabaseModule
Uses Dagger @Provides-annotated methods to satisfy dependencies on concrete implementations of SereknittyDatabase and UserDao.
SettingsActivity
Hosts an instance of SettingsActivity.SettingsFragment to present a settings screen without any additional UI elements (such as options menu).
SettingsActivity.SettingsFragment
Presents a standard settings screen, populated from the PreferenceScreen declared in res/xml/settings.xml.
SettingsFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
Stitch
This is an Enum that holds a list of stitches.
StitchesAdapter
This Adapter is the joining element between the data and the view model.
User
Encapsulates the data elements maintained for a signed-in user in the app's Room/SQLite-based persistent data store.
UserDao
Provides CRUD operations on User entity instances.
UserRepository
Provides high-level operations on a repository of User instances, backed by a SQLite database, in turn accessed via SereknittyDatabase.
UserViewModel
Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the User entity instance corresponding to the current signed-in user, a user specified by its unique identifier (primary key value), and the full collection of users who have signed in to the app.
